channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Michigan fails in bid to build semiconductor manufacturing plant, Whitmer blames ‘massive economic uncertainty’
item.description: The news quickly set off dueling political statements from Republicans and Democrats in the state.

item.title: The Grand Canyon Fire Has North Rim Residents Wary of the Future
item.description: Fire crews allowed a fire to burn through brush on the Grand Canyon’s North Rim. Then they lost control.

item.title: Trump Has Promised More Tariffs on Mexico. What Happens Next?
item.description: President Trump has threatened to increase Mexico’s tariff rate to 30 percent starting Aug. 1, claiming the country hasn’t sufficiently tackled drug c...

item.title: Broadway’s ‘Gypsy’ Revival, Starring Audra McDonald, Will Close
item.description: The show is the sixth musical to announce a closing date since last month’s Tony Awards, reflecting financial challenges facing producers.

item.title: Eswatini Says It Will Repatriate Migrants Deported by the Trump Administration
item.description: The Trump administration sent five deportees to Eswatini, an African kingdom, saying that their own countries would not take them. But Eswatini says i...

item.title: Lightning Kills 1 and Injures 13 on Archery Range in New Jersey
item.description: The victims range in age from 7 to 61, according to the authorities.

item.title: Paulette Jiles, 82, Dies; Novelist Evoked the West in ‘News of the World’

item.description: President Trump has threatened to increase Mexico’s tariff rate to 30 percent starting Aug. 1, claiming the country hasn’t sufficiently tackled drug c...

item.title: Trump brokers deal for Coca-Cola to use ‘REAL Cane Sugar’ in U.S. Coke products
item.description: First it was the Gulf of Mexico, now Trump is coming for "Mexican Coke."

item.title: JPMorgan’s plan to charge for data could ‘cripple’ crypto and fintech startups, execs warn
item.description: Kraken Co-CEO Sethi calls JPMorgan fees a toll that limits what can be built.

item.title: Coke tight-lipped on Trump’s promise to make American Coke with real sugar again

item.title: Trump says he ‘talked about the concept of firing’ Jerome Powell. Stocks went for a ride
item.description: The S&P 500 rose 0.3% after whipping through an earlier drop and subsequent recovery. The Dow gained 231 points, or 0.5%, and the Nasdaq added 0.3% to...

item.title: Migration Fears Turn Europe’s Borderless Dreams Into Traffic Nightmares
item.description: Germany’s new government imposed border checks to demonstrate toughness on migration, though crossings started slowing years ago.

item.title: Israel Strikes Syria’s Capital, Sending Warning to Government
